Review: Room, facilities, breakfast, location
Title: Exceptional

Review: Very clean
Title: Good stay considering nothing was open

Review: Great location, wonderful to walk through the park (especially now since not much else is open)! The staff was very helpful, and we really liked the design of the room. Lovely breakfast, brought to our room (no buffet because of corona). Lots of different food items even though we only mentioned our dietary preferences (vegetarian) the evening before (croissant, sandwiches, muffin, egg, yoghurt, fruit, juice, etc!). All in all a great experience.
Title: Great location, room, and service

Review: Location, interior
Title: Nice and posh

Review: Wonderfully decorated. Extremely functional. Friendly staff. Serene location.
Title: Exceptional

Review:
The room looked nice and clean, also the rest of the hotel was modern and clean.
The restaurant was fantastic.
Title: Very Good

Review: Excellent location; room and bathroom are super clean with great facilities
Title: Amazing and good value

Review: Beautiful area to be located in and staff were so friendly and accommodating!.
Title: Exceptional

Review: On arrival to the hotel we were greeted with friendly staff who went above and beyond to ensure we were happy and had everything we needed. They provided us with a map of amsterdam whilst letting us know the closest tram routes into central. Throughout our stay the staff were pleasant, helpful and were more than happy to help us with any issues. Room service was nice however options are limited which is the only drawback. Everything else was perfect and I would definitely stay here again when visiting amsterdam.
Title: Exceptional stay

Review: The room was very cosy and all the measures relating to covid were in place without it being too excessive. I really appreciated the comfort of the bed and cushions and we enjoyed a varied and good quality breakfast. Located next to vonderlpark, the location of the hotel is perfect.
Title: A little nest

Review:
Hotel was clean and the room is enough big for 2 people.
Everything was clean an the shower is excellent.
You can leave your car just in front of the hotel and pay, or leave your car at olympia stadion (20min walk).
Title: Good geographique situation

Review: Friendly staff, lovely room and very clean.
Title: Lovely hotel

Review: Rooms are very modern and comfortable
Title: Exceptional

Review: The modern take on a classic building.
Title: Exceptional

Review: very comfortable and big room
Title: excellent stay

Review: The hotel, the location, the staff all was perfect. Nice rooms not big but everything needed, the staff was super helpful. Set in a beautiful surroundings. Perfect!
Title: Loved it

Review: We stayed in the Junior Suite. Excellent room with spacious balcony overlooking a quiet and upmarket residential road. Staff were very helpful and accommodating. They provided a cot for our baby. Close to a side entrance of Vondelpark. Bathroom had a large bath tub and a large shower. Would stay again and recommend.
Title: Excellent quality and service. Great value. Exceeded expectations.

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Review: Great service! Very friendly! Especially mister Tomasz!
Title: We will stay again in this hotel!

Review: The location near Vondelpark was ace —very green and quiet!
Title: Very Good

Review: From the moment we entered the hotel we were welcomed warmly, our room was spotless.  Room design and facilities were amazing. I especially loved the remote control panel of the whole room. Also if we knew how amazing the restaurant downstairs was, we would have had a table reserved. %100 would stay again.
Title: Amazing stay

Review: We enjoyed our time here. Everyone were smiling, polite and willing to help. A big appreciation for the early check in, so we could leave our bags and refreshen up before our exploration of the beautiful city of Amsterdam and also loved after check out we could leave our bags at the reception, so we could hang out more in the surroundings before our departure. The surrounding has everything what you need, a grocery market nearby, beautiful restaurants and the biggest plus is that the tram station is nearby which tram nr. 2 takes you throughout the hottest spots in the city. And also loved the park/oasis at the hotel where you can enjoy your drink and smoke in peace. Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay here again.
Title: Perfect home base

Review: So friendly, kind and helpful.  Made my twin 13 year olds feel welcome, even to sleep on the chairs in the bar.
Title: Very enjoyable.  Excellent location and very quiet.

Review: good room size, the bed was very comfortable, and the hotel staff were lovely.
Title: Very Good

Review: Everything
Title: Always great

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Review: Pretty nice stylish boutique hotel with strategic position. Perfect connection with the center and the airport by public transports.Taxi to schipol Airport costs around 30 euro. Gorgeous inner restaurant. Excellent international breakfast. Restaurants and cafes in walking distance. Helpful staff. Small but comfy rooms
Title: 4 days in Amsterdam

Review: We found the room very new, clean and equipped with the comforts of modern technology with a panel that controlled the lighting, air con etc.  The bed was comfortable, and the water pressure in the shower was excellent, and the coffee machine was a nice extra. I  also want to add that all the staff were excellent and very helpful.  The location in front of the Vondel Park we also loved, and enjoyed walking through it towards the museum instead of the streets, however the area around the hotel was so beautiful and had some very nice selections of local restaurants to choose from, so it was also nice to eat close to home.  We didn't eat at the hotel but noticed it was very popular, including the modern little bar. I would stay here again.
Title: New, clean, beautiful location

Review: All excellent
Title: Great hotel

Review:
The room was better than expected. Bed and shower are very good. Breakfast was great (coffee is the only let down) 
Would highly recommend!
Title: Loved it

Review:
Very good location 
Friendly staff
Title: Perfect location

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Review:
The staff were very friendly. Hotel was clean and bed was super comfy.
Lovely shower and toiletries.
Title: Very Good

Review: Nice bed and shower. Great location.
Title: Perfect location outside of the tourist buzz

Review: excellent location
Title: great location and excellent facilities

Review:
- Very quiet room
- big TV
- great large and comfy bed
- very beautiful location
- easy parking in the streets
- great service
Title: A little heaven in cosy Amsterdam part

Review: Great location
Title: Exceptional

Review: Beautiful, calm, and convenient location next to Vondelpark. Nice cozy bar to hang out in. Overall very nice service. Liked the decor style and the bed was super comfortable. Also liked having Nespresso machine in room. Great bathroom too. Loved the linens on the bed - natural fibers, good quality.
Title: Cozy, friendly, hip, and convenient

Review: Breakfast was very good, once the eggs that were help up before of lively discussions among staff were actually delivered, rather than be held up in the hands of one of the staff. Perhaps guests need a greater priority than the lights.
Title: Worth a repeat.

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Review: Fantastic location! Quiet and just a walking distance from center.
Title: Hope to come to stay again!

Review:
It is a good hotel, a bit expensive for my standards but it is in fact pretty fancy.
The position is ok, you need to go on a tram ride to reach the centre, but you have a beautiful big park nearby. Plus it is possible to walk to several museums like the Van Gogh one.
Title: Nice stay!

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Review:
The location most of all. The revamp of the hotel has taken it back up to where it used to be and improved on the feel. 
The bar area was warm and welcoming.
Title: Very enjoyable, well located hotel.

Review: Very comfortable, well equipped clean room, convenient location for museums/galleries, very friendly and helpful staff, excellent Venetian restaurant/bar. Will definitely try and stay here again on our next visit to Amsterdam.
Title: Wonderful

Review: Excellent location in quiet plush upmarket neighbourhood a few minutes walk from Vondel Park. There are many bars and brasseries within a short walking distance. A 15 minute tram ride will take you into the centre of town. The excellent Kashmir Lounge coffee shop and very welcoming local bars are a 20 minute walk away on Jan Pieter Heijestraat. The hotel (397 bus from the airport to Emmastraat) is superb and beautifully appointed. The Italian themed bar and restaurant were constantly busy during my stay. The staff were extremely helpful and attentive and went out of their way to make you feel welcome. I was upgraded to a larger room at no extra cost.
Title: Excellent, spotlessly clean and well appointed hotel with very helpful and welcoming staff.

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Review: Lovely welcome as we were soaking wet after cycling in pouring rain.  We had a lovely room which was very quiet with an excellent shower and beautiful bed linen and comfortable mattress.
Title: Wonderful

Room_info: Deluxe King Room with Garden View
Review:
Comfort
Friendliness of the team 
Location
Title: Perfect home base in a prime location

Review: Good sized room, the location is great as it’s right by the park and the design of the hotel is really nice.
Title: Good

Review: Breakfast was very good, the location is wonderful, on the edge of Vondelpark, surrounded by trees and beautiful houses, the hotel includes a delicious Italian restaurant, the staff is attentive and polite, the room spotless, the towels very clean. I will stay there again!
Title: A hidden gem!

Review: Clean and very comfortable
Title: Very Good

Review: Very nice and alive bar and restaurant area; excellent quality breakfast; surrounding neighborhood is a cozy spot in Amsterdam
Title: Pleasant stay in a quiet and cool area

Review:
Staff are lovely, genuine and friendly. Rooms are spotlessly clean. Linen and towels fresh & white. 
Absolutely faultless.
Title: Perfect.

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Review:
very friendly staff.  helpful to be able to store bags.  comfortable room.  Good bed.
Location was good next to Vondelpark, and near museums.
Title: Wonderful

Review: Very clean and tidy , staff very helpful
Title: Nice place to stay

Review: Modern hotel with thoughtful touches - good hairdryer, mineral water on demand. Our room smelt fresh and we slept extremely well. Breakfast room beautiful with natural light, breakfast buffet excellent. USB points, clever control console for lights and good sound quality on in-room tv (music). Thanks, we had a lovely stay.
Title: Wonderful

Review:
I managed to book at a last minute rate so good value, exceptional welcome, superb room, very clean. 
This is a particularly good hotel, I recommend it very highly.
Title: Very Good

Review: The room was cozy with a comfortable bed and nice bathroom.
Title: Exceptional

Review:
They really took good care of us. All my special requests were all been arranged by staff Marcos.
Room are fully equipped with nice view and comfortable bed. Definitely need to try their restaurant !!
Title: Cozy corner in Amsterdam! Will definitely come back again

Review: Vondelpark is very conveniently located - it’s a quaint area and close to the various museums. We will be staying here again!
Title: Very Good

Review: Friendly and lovely reception team, easy to access on the tram from Amsterdam station, beautiful rooms loved the mood lighting! Gorgeous bathrooms - luxury. Beds were extremely comfy - best nights sleep ever!
Title: Beautiful and luxurious hotel, let down badly by its association with TOZI restaurant

Review: Rooms were newly renovated and they were spacious for Amsterdam. Free tea and coffee variety in the room was very good. Even though the hotel is not very close to the city center, ti is very nice neighborhood.
Title: Good quality but could be less expensive

Review: very friendly staff!!
Title: Very Good

Review: Finally a hotel that I would love to come back to when visiting Amsterdam. Clean and really nicely made. Convenient for transport use and really close to quite a nice  park if you want to have a run. Recommending!
Title: Exceptional

Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful. Room was perfect for a city break. Cosy but not too small and very comfortable and stylish!
Title: Stylish, comfortable stay

Review: A well-appointed comfortable hotel just outside of the centre of Amsterdam. Easy to get to the tourist hotspots and great walk on Vondelpark
Title: Lots of Character, and very well appointed. Easy transport to any place in Amsterdam

Review: Very cozy rooms, modern tv system - you can connect via iPhone and watch whatever you want. Good breakfast choice and very nice area around the hotel - beautiful houses and park. Just a 10 min walk to the 397 bus to the airport.
Title: Wonderful

Review: We paid to upgrade our standard room to a better one, which turned out to be a really good deal. The suite with balcony is huge and beautiful. A good value for money! Staff is super friendly!  Breakfast is delicious.
Title: A wonderful experience!

Review: Breakfast was brilliant. Loved the little touches in the room, such as the books and toiletries.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Modern quaint hotel located in a lovely suburb opposite the Vondel Park. Friendly staff!   Would definitely visit there again on our next trip to Amsterdam.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Breakfast buffet choice very good and good quality. Like the real tea leaves tees served. Good choice of healthy foods.
Title: Very Good

Review: Best shower and bed ever. Great welcome. Lovely breakfast. Staff were so lovely and helpful. Hotel had lots of great little touches and Vondelpark was a fantastic park. Cot was provided with some free toiletries for our daughter. Really, really enjoyable stay.
Title: BEAUTIFUL BOUTIQUE HOTEL WITH LOVELY STAFF

Review: The room is warm and clean. The staff are very helpful.
Title: Wonderful experience

Review: Cozy hotel in a calm place just 15 minutes walking to the Museums. Very good breakfast. Public transport in 2 minutes as well. The Italian restaurant is really good. They offer small dishes for sharing. the best Carbonara I have ever tasted.
Title: Cozy calm hotel in just 15 min walking to Museum Van Gogh. Excellent Italian Restaurant.

Review: Friendly staff, clean rooms, high quality linen, TV with casting support, rain shower head.
Title: Excellent

Review: Very nice food! I tried it both at the restaurant and as room service
Title: Wonderful

Review: Close to the tram stop and the food is amazing
Title: Wonderful

Review: I Liked the location, not in city Centre but only a couple of minutes by tram into the Centre. The hotel was nice with friendly staff.

Review: THEY GIVE US SOME TEA!!!!!!!!!!

Review: The control pad in the room for the curtains and lights
Title: Exceptional

Review: Location, close to Vondelpark and plenty of restaurants.  Staff (reception, restaurant, cleaning, everyone) was just amazing.  Our room (junior suite) and bathroom were awesome.  My wife and son just loved the place. We would be very happy to come back here.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Room was clean. Hotel facilities were superb. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Location was close enough to public transport and right beside the beautiful Vondelpark.

Review: I liked that the rooms were modern with the automated lights and curtains

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Review: The hotel itself was amazing, Great location if you do not want to me right in the centre of Amsterdam. Staff was amazing too, so helpful!
Title: Wonderful

Review: Clean, staff friendly, lovely location near the park and walkable you the city centre
Title: Exceptional

Review: I've been many countries in Europe however this is the best hotel I ever stayed...Fabulous customer service till last movement...I would suggest the rest to go for it...Location was awesome...very close to Tram and just 5 min to City center.
Title: Fabulous stay

Review: The facility is very comfortable and the team is truly friendly
Title: Great Italian Restaurant on site

Review: Friendly staff at reception.
Title: Great stay in a lovely hotel located in a nice, central and quiet area.

Review:
High quality boutique feel with lots of nice touches. Staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms were comfy and well appointed. 
Wi-Fi was free and decent for all requirements. 
Public Transport was close and the location on Vondelpark was wonderful.
Title: Amsterdam on the quiet side

Review: Great interior design. Excellent location next to the Vondel park in a historical quarter with beautiful architecture/houses, it is nearby the city center but not too crowded with tourists.
Title: Great place to stay in Amsterdam and experience the best of the city!

Review:
Perfect location. Just in front to Vondelpark in a quite elegant and beautiful residential area. Nevertheless the tramway stop is round the corner and in a few minutes ride you can get to the city centre. Only 3 stops to the Museum's district. Many nice bars and restaurants within a 5 minute walk. 
Front desk and restaurant personnel very polite and professional.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Fabulous hotel, very stylish and comfortable. Breakfast was delicious plenty of choice. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Great location, Vondel Park is beautiful. I would recommend this hotel!

Review: Very nice location, good restaurant, all very clean and well taken care of. Friendly staf

Review: Great location. Lovely restaurant and bar area.
Title: Good

Review:
Staff are helpful and friendly. 
Great location next to the park and close enough to the tram stop. 
The room was clean with many mod cons.
Title: Great location and a clean, comfortable stay

Review: Excellent accommodation in a beautiful surrounding of Amsterdam, really nice staff, looking ftw to come back.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Great location, clean, stylish and comfortable rooms, good breakfast
Title: Great boutique hotel

Review:
Superb!
Lovely hotel, new renovated and cozy, beautifully designed.
Incredibly clean.
Friendly and welcoming staff.
Warmly recommended
Title: Value for money guaranteed

Review: The location was amazing! My parents love staying in off central places that are in quiet neighborhoods, and the hotel's proximity to Vondelpark meant we started each day feeding the birds and watching the dogs play. It was great easing into the culture of the city which was so different from the vibe of the area the hotel was in. Topnotch food for breakfast too, well worth the 15 euros, and the staff always had a genuine smile to their faces. Did I mention the free bird feeds that would make you the envy of parkgoers? :)
Title: Vondelpark Wonderpark!

Review: Staff were extremely attentive and always made sure you have what you need. Great location right next to an amazing park
Title: Exceptional

Review: The hotel is a recently renewed palace sited in a residential area, just behind Vondelpark, a very nice green area in the center of the city. The staff is always kind and polite, and the other extra services (such as bike renting, fitness area, restaurant ecc) enhanced the good impression that we had at the check in. Rooms and spaces have been furnished paying attention to every detail, setting a high quality standard for the hotel.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Very good aria,beautiful room, very comfortable bed,very happy
Title: Exceptional

Review: Quality of materials used in the room were of high standards. Staff were very helpful, especially Victoria who introduced us to all the amenities and recommendations on how to get around.  Made my experience in Amsterdam very welcoming.  There r bike rentals u can enjoy riding like a local and explore vondelpark nearby and the neighbourhood.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Really nice hotel and great stuff. Super location.
Title: Exceptional

Review:
Clean tidy room. Location amazing, quiet area, easy tram links into city centre. 
Staff were alwsys helpful and polite, doing all tbey could to help.
Title: Overall a lovely hotel

Review: Friendly, accommodating reception staff. Well designed rooms, nice bathroom and good water pressure in the shower.
Title: Excellent

Review: The location is great! Love the neighbourhood around and the park is just a few steps away. Our attic room was very well decorated and comfortable and the roof view was great!
Title: Exceptional

Review: Staff were exceptional, one in particular (Kiera) at check-in. Its a lovely property, located in a quieter area, great for walking, and access to Vondelpark.
Title: Exceptional

Review: The ambience was amazing and anybody visiting amsterdam must at the property . Quite near to tram and easy to connect to anywhere in amsterdam
Title: Exceptional

Review: Terrific little property so conveniently located on the tram line and just 10-15 mins into Amsterdam Central. The walk in along the canal is just picture perfect and lots of lovely shops if you go via the street. The rooms are fabulous and come with lovely extras you don’t expect and the renovation is just about finished now save for the external gardens and when they are done it really makes this a great property.
Title: Park Plaza Vondel Park

Review: Location, clean , staff were amazing
Title: Wonderful

Review: The breakfast was extensive and delicious every morning. There was something for all tastes and the food was fresh and delicious.
Title: The location, comfort and staff friendliness at the hotel were all wonderful.

Review: The bathroom was very clean, staff was extremely helpful and kind, location was good and silent.
Title: Good

Review: Really lovely hotel, staff were great, nice room.
Title: Amsterdam is lovely, will definitely go back.

Review: The whole hotel was modern and fresh. Beds comfortable and the staff couldn’t do enough for us. Brilliant location next to the park. Will visit again !
Title: Loved every minute of it !

Review: Staff is very nice, also restaurant is beyond what you could expect in this kind of hotel. They renovated the rooms and also have very big nice tv. Internet is okay. Not fast not slow. Location is not very far away from tram stops 5 minutes walking.
Title: Very Good

Review: Great location, with easy access to Vondelpark, Restaurants, Stores, Shops, Tram, etc. The Hotel itself is warm and cosy, with an onsite restaurant, bar that stays open until 1am and gym. Staff members are very friendly and helpful, always serving with a smile.
Title: Great Hotel, location & staff!

Review: Location
Title: Exceptional

Review: Clean, private rooms
Title: Well located and clean place

Review: Good value for money!
Title: Exceptional

Review:
I liked everything! The staff at the reception was very nice and helpful, the room was clean and nicely decorated.
The breakfast was delicious with organic food, fresh, and good products, just the way I like it.
No doubt, I recommend!
Title: Very nice hotel

Review: Everything. Fantastic staff, lovely room, comfortable bed, nice bathroom, good breakfast. Peaceful location but very handy for the museums.
Title: Exceptional

Review: The Stake ordered via Room Service was very good with quality of the breakfast on par. And the really special moment was the camera obscura generated on the way by the morning sunlight coming through the curtains (picture uploaded in the Happy Snapper section) :).
Title: Exceptional

Review: Great hotel in fantastic location
Title: Great stay

Review: Bed was comfortable, staffs were good.

Review: Comfortable bed, super clean, friendly staff.

Review: Location
Title: Exceptional

Review: We were pleasantly surprised by the level of the service, technology and comfort offered by the hotel. The location is extremely convenient - at a walking distance from the Museum quarter, but off the main tourist paths. The restaurant is very nice too, with proper wine selection. Happy to recommend the place to the others.
Title: Charming hi-tech hotel close to the Museum district of Amsterdam

Review:
The hotel is located in a great neighborhood, so close to a beautiful park which you can enjoy walking or jogging all day long. Although the hotel is a bit far from the city center and touristic attractions, you can find a tram station within 4mins or walk around 45mins to get there.
Staff are also kind and responsive
Title: Excellent

Review: We have stayed for three nights and were celebrating my wife’s birthday. Everything what I have asked for was prepared in the smallest detail. Thank you to all the staff for a warm welcome and great atmosphere. Location perfect calm close to the park and close to all main attractions. Room very comfortable with amazing materace. Very clean hotel recently refurbished. Good food in the restaurant. I totally recommend the hotel.
Title: Fantastic hotel - great birthday time

Review: Amazing staff
Title: Exceptional

Review: Great location, we stayed four days and didn’t take any public transport to get around the city. Some bars and restaurants and Vondelpark nearby. Bed very comfortable and shower in the room was great, breakfast had plenty of options.
Title: Great Location

Review: The location of the hotel is perfect and the hotel staff are very kind and helpful
Title: Exceptional

Review: Wonderful location - right next to Vondelpark and a short walk from shops, cafes and transport links. Room was modern and everything we needed for a weekend stay.
Title: Very Good

Review: Nice bed, good pillows. Good bathroom with a nice shower.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Friendly staff. Great location by a beautiful park. 15 min to center. Nice neighborhood
Title: Very Good

Review: good location, very friendly staffs! Smart TV worked very good.
Title: Quite nice stay.

Review: Location and it's quite area
Title: Exceptional

Review: The services’ welcome early in the morning made our day better after our long trip. Good location, really good breakfast and smily service makes your stay unforgettable.
Title: Exceptional

Review:
I was cheated, but I don't know by who: 
I paid for an improved room, called “king size” a bigger one, and I got the most small one.
I'd really like to know who made the decision to charge me extra for placing us in a minimum size room, company Booking.com or hotel’s management.
Our vacation was largely ruined by a lack of comfort.
It wasn't just the money (and I intend to get a refund), but our entire vacation was below the expected level.
Title: Please advise who cheated me

Review: Location!
Title: Exceptional

Review: Very nice room, bathroom big and brand new. Very good ratio price and quality.
Title: Exceptional

Review:
Great location
Comfortable and clean room
Friendly and welcoming staff 
Complimentary daily water in the room
WiFi is very fast and connection is stable
Title: Very pleasant stay at a great location

Review:
location, location, location.
staff very cooperative and nice.
Title: Very Good

Review: Ecerything.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Excellent attentive staff. Good location for restaurants and the tram into town.
Title: High quality accommodation with excellent facilities.

Review:
Every detail they thought about it from the electric dash board to control all over the room , smart tv and a google chormcast ! 
The room is super comfy its the best hotel in Amsterdam I’ve stayed it was my first time and wouldn’t be the last one for sure 
In conclusion , I highly recommend it
Title: One of the best if it’s not the best

Review: The location is perfect! The best neighborhood in Amsterdam. The room is good decorated and clean. The staff are really nice and helpful.
Title: Exceptional

Review:
great value for money, good vary breakfast. 
very clean rooms. we took the junior suites that came with a really nice balcony. 
20 minutes walk to the city center (but right near the park entrance)
Title: Excellent

Review: Beautiful hotel, great location!
Title: Definitely a keeper

Review: Staff was very friendly and helpful. Location is great- quiet and peaceful in a great neighbourhood
Title: I loved it. Feel like home away from home

Review:
The location is great - A quiet neighborhood a minute from Vondelpark. The room was spacious and clean, the beds were comfortable and the lighting system was great, relatively to most hotels. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. 
The breakfast was good.
Title: a very pleasant stay

Review: Refurbished, stunning interior. Don’t be fooled by outer look, rooms very nice! Sufficient parking just in front
Title: Perfect

Review: The hotel is in a higher rent area without being too snooty, but just a wee bit over-priced.  If you are a teenager in your 20's you may find the location too subdued/boring.  The hotel is modern, quiet, clean and located across from beautiful Vondel Park, which is a good location if you want to be a little outside the hustle of the touristy city center, but close enough to it.  It is close to museums, which are within a short walk (about 8-10 minutes).  Our family prefers to walk so walking distance is subjective.  The street train is super easy to catch and use. You can buy train tickets on the train (no cash, card only). Plenty of restaurants and a few shops nearby.  Beverages in the minibar were free but didn't have much in it (water, apple juice, and sparkling water).  The air conditioning and blackout curtains on remote control were lovely! I would definitely stay again.
Title: Great location close to museums if that's your thang! :)

Review: Lovely place,perfect location and absolutely helpful and nice staff:)))
Title: Exceptional

Review: Everything
Title: Perfect

Review:
The area is lovely, right next to the park and some really nice restaurants. Easy access to trams or uber taxis. 
The staff are really helpful with perfect English.
Great wifi, water and coffee in the rooms too.
Title: Wonderful

Review: See above!
Title: Exceptional

Review: Great location, next to a beautiful park and close to the centre of Amsterdam. Very nice and helpful staff.
Title: Exceptional

Review: The hotel is beautiful and next to a really nice park. Great public transport links. Staff were outstanding - we had already checked out and were picking up bags to go to the airport. My husband needed to pray and asked if they have a prayer room. They didn’t but let him go into one of the conference rooms. Also, I wanted to send a postcard to my family and couldn’t find any post boxes in town so they took our card to post it. Such a memorable experience and I am sure I will stay there again next time I come to Amsterdam.
Title: I absolutely enjoyed every moment in the hotel.

Review:
Staff were absolutely excellent, friendly and very helpful, especially Kate.
Newly refurbished room was comfortable.
Electronic controls for curtains, lights etc were useful.
Nespresso capsules and coffee machine were great to have.
Fridge with refilled water was excellent in the heat.
Luggage storage facilities.
Title: Comfortable and modern hotel, excellent service.

Review: We think that this is one of the most beautiful part of Amsterdam. Nice restaurants, great places to sit outside, no crowd and just so pleasant.
Title: Excellent

Review: Fantastic location, lovely walk through park to get to museums, good local restaurants, interesting area. Hotel newly reopened after refurbishment, staff very attentive and helpful.
Title: Wonderful

Review: Andrea on reception was particularly helpful to my wife when she arrived late after a cancelled flight. Despite a delay in the booking details getting through to the hotel. She ensured that a room was made available as soon as possible.
Title: Exceptional

Review: Quite place
Title: Very Good

Review: The shower. Room light controller.
Title: Happy

Review: Very nice location, friendly staff, luggage room, bathrobes, very convenient lights and a/c control, possible to attend top gym next door for free
Title: Excellent

Review:
The hotel, the rooms, the location, the staff++
I have stay here multiple times already and enjoy cominy back.
Extra mention to the night man Ferey (not sure if I spelt it right), always going above and beyond the call of duty to make the guests feel welcome and appreciated. :)
Title: Exceptional

Review: Staff was super friendly and engaging. Typical funny & friendly Dutch! The room was just gorgeous. Everything was very comfortable; Sheets, soft towels, robes, pillows, and bed: all amazing. We had a double bed and the pullout couch which was a bed. I normally hate pull out beds, but this one was amazingly comfortable! The staff had it all set up when we arrived as well. Everything was spotless! They even  had a scale in the bathroom which was a helpful touch. The hotel is next to a beautiful park and close to a tram into the center of Amsterdam near the museum district. There is a cute area with some nice restaurants within walking distance.
Title: Comfortable, gorgeous, and great location!

Review: The team is very kind and helpful
Title: Exceptional

Review:
Good staff and very good location.
The breakfast is great even if the restaurant is under construction.
Title: Good

Review: The staff is very helpful and delightful to deal with
Title: Good

Room_info: Superior Queen Room with Garden View
Review:
I reserved a room with garden view, and got email confirmation from Park Plaza.  When I got there they tried to give me a street view.  Finally upgraded to a room that was too high and more viewed a building than the garden.
Lights are controlled at a multi-switch next to bed, instead of individual lights for different locations in the room.  This is inconvenient, doesn't enable doing the lighting we wanted, and hard to learn to use.  They should go back to the old system and ditch this new tech one.
breakfast was ok, but hard to get anything smaller than the more costly buffet.

Title: Very Good

Review: Everything remained wonderful until the moment we checked out on 27th noon. The woman with blonde hair who helped me to check out was totally not respectful. She was even chatting with other employees passing by front desk while I was asking her questions. She was the only reason that I can’t give 10 of their service. Otherwise everything was so perfect here.
Title: Cozy corner in Amsterdam! Will definitely come back again

Review:
We can’t fault the hotel itself, however we dined at TOZI on our first night and this restaurant seriously let’s down the branding and messaging of the hotel.
When we arrived we asked for a reservation at the restaurant for 6pm. The receptionist kindly took us to the restaurant reservations team where we were told it was totally fully booked. Even for 6pm they had zero tables available. Disappointed we headed back to our room, changed and went back down to try TOZI bar. We asked if it was possible to order something from the restaurant to eat in the bar. The very rude bar lady told us absolutely not - and instead offered us a table reluctantly in the restaurant. Upon arrival in the restaurant we looked around to find only 2 tables occupied. It was now 6.30pm. The atmosphere in the restaurant was hostile and pretentious, men in tweed suits prancing around doing nothing and dictating what and how we should order from the menu - there was sexism in the patronising way they spoke to us. The food was ok, although they need to work on their carbonara as it was actually pasta in a cheese fondu sauce which after a couple of mouthfuls was inedible. The lardons were also covered in pig hair. The wine was free poured instead of being bought to us by the glass. After a very disappointing dining experience we walked past the reservation screen and noted that half the table had not been reserved so why were we told it was fully booked? We would strongly urge hotel management to rethink its association with this restaurant.
Title: Beautiful and luxurious hotel, let down badly by its association with TOZI restaurant

Bed was too short for tall men.

Title: Lovely hotel and great location.

Review: We had a bit of an unpleasant situation. In the morning of our check out day, my partner and I were headed to the gym, when I realized, my AirPods were missing. After looking everywhere, I figured they were taken. My partner and I were traveling from Brussels, where I was for work. I retraced my steps. I clearly, had my AirPods with me when we left Brussels. And I remembered unpacking in Amsterdam, and seeing my pods in the pouch where I keep all of my cables (as any frequent traveler would I suppose). Before going downstairs, I asked my friend, who is the Guest Relations Manager at a five-star hotel, what is the general procedure. I then went down to speak with the reception. The person I spoke to was skeptical. Surely, that's her job to make sure, I was not making this up. When someone you never met, is doubting you, and your judgment, it is really hard to explain, that you are a responsible person, frequent traveler, and someone whose work is recognized internationally and that you would not make something like this up. She did inform the manager, who spoke to me shortly after. As we were checking out, the manager once again, approached me and said there will be a thorough investigation and that they would get back to me. I thanked the manager for the effort. And apologized for bringing this up, but I also had no other choice but to report the incident. Later in the evening, we noticed that my partner was also missing some cash. The reason we only noticed it then, was because it was our local currency. And since we were headed back home, we wanted to make sure we had enough cash for a taxi from the airport. Just as it was in my case, that pouch never left the room and he too was absolutely certain he arrived at the hotel with all the money in the pouch. I realize, this is why hotels have a safe but honestly, I thought it was a hotel with a reputational name to it! I also did not want to leave negative scores because we enjoyed the rooms and the service.
Title: Beautiful location in a quiet neighborhood, walking distance to main museums & comfortable rooms

Review: There were several surprises with payment, an extra tourist fee, extra breakfast fee(we paid for breakfast in advance, and it was an extra fee when we arrived), and a deposit fee. The breakfast is poor.

Review:
Our room was dirty. Had a dried up mucus-like substance on our bed sheet, blood stain on the covers, the tables were extremely dusty and the shower drain had hairs from the previous guests. I notified the reception. They took half an hour to clean the room and only managed to remove the hair from the shower. We were given cookies to compensate for the trouble. Laughable to say the least. 
Besides the condition of the room, the check in process was cumbersome. I signed less documents getting a mortgage. Also, why reserve 50 euros on the guests' CC if you only offer water in the mini bar?
